titleInfo.title: Data publication: Heavy quark momentum diffusion from the lattice using gradient flow

mods.abstract: Data publication for "Heavy quark momentum diffusion from the lattice using gradient flow", [Phys. Rev. D 103, 014511](https://doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevD.103.014511), [arXiv:2009.13553](https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.13553). Contains plot scripts and data shown in figures.
